I wanted to like this. But Meteo has severely limited locational knowledge when set manually (important for VPN users). None of the many cities named Paris exist. Boston? You mean the Kentucky or Pennsylvania one? Rome? Only the one in New York state. Toronto is in the Czech Republic. Chicago is in the Phillipines. Sydney is in North Dakota, USA. Dallas? Tokyo? Seattle? Rio de Janero? Mumbai? Seoul? Dublin? Vaporized by aliens.

But problems for non-VPN users abound. 
Ever seen "Momento"? Your preferences are forgotten as soon as you close the settings dialog.
And, most damning, the system tray indicator, which you probably saw as its killer feature, doesn't show the temperature. There's just a small, sad speck of cloud icon with no number. Clicking it, the dropdown gives *every* other statistic and that's actually really cool! But the temperature? THE thing you most care about? ...Ever heard of Paris? Me neither.

(Maybe the flaw is our Snaps. I'm going to try directly adding the PPA, because I *want* to like this app.)

Obvious searches for well known cities failed to resolve or failed to list the most probable choice, Philadelphia for example. Maps failed to load.

У меня карта заработала после установки libcanberra-gtk-module. В целом показания погоды соответствуют действительности.
Всё работает, всё само подхватилось и определилось, и замечательно всё показывает, как на скринах. И карта сама по себе работает.
